Biography

Qipeng Liu received the B.S. degree in automation from Jinan University, Shandong, China, in 2007, the M.S. degree in control theory and control engineering from the Jiangsu University of Science and Technology, Zhenjiang, China, in 2009, and the Ph.D. degree in control theory and control engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai, China, in 2014.
Since 2014, he has worked in the Institute of Complexity Science, Qingdao University, Qingdao, China. Since 2016, he has been a research fellow in the School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
His current research interests include secure control system and its application on autonomous vehicles, information diffusion in social networks, and cooperative control of multiagent systems.
